title: Council AI
description:
Make better decisions using the wisdom of the AI crowd. Eliminate AI bias and detect hallucinations by seeing answers from the world's best AI, i.e. Google, OpenAI, Anthropic, Perplexity, and xAI, in a summary table. You can easily spot AI hallucinations and make better decisions.

The app also has interesting councils (groups of AI assistants) that give you perspectives from "across the aisle". For example, the "Politics" council has three opinions from a Democrat, Libertarian, and Republican.
